description: Transform The 7th Signal platform article pages and footer to match Amp's design aesthetic, plus create all required static pages for footer links

userStories.title: Full-width hero images on article pages
userStories.description: Article pages should display featured images as edge-to-edge hero images above the content area
acceptanceCriteria: Hero image spans full viewport width (edge-to-edge)
Image positioned above the main content container
Image has appropriate aspect ratio (16:9 or similar)
Fallback styling when no image is present
userStories.notes: Reference Amp's article layout with hero images bleeding to edges

userStories.title: Breadcrumb format update
userStories.description: Update breadcrumb format to: CHRONICLE / [CATEGORY] | [TITLE] with proper separators
acceptanceCriteria: Slash separator between CHRONICLE and category
Pipe separator between category and title
userStories.notes: Current format uses // and /, need to change to / and |

userStories.title: Date with left accent border line
userStories.description: Display article date with a gold/accent color vertical line on the left side
acceptanceCriteria: Date has chronicle-accent colored left border
Padding between border and date text
userStories.notes: Accent border provides visual distinction for metadata

userStories.title: Large italic serif title styling
userStories.description: Article title uses Playfair Display italic at very large size

userStories.title: Body prose styling for rich content
userStories.description: Article body has proper prose styling for inline links, bullet points, and images
acceptanceCriteria: Inline links styled with chronicle-accent underline
Bullet points properly styled and indented
Images within content have proper margins
userStories.notes: Use Tailwind prose classes customized with chronicle tokens

userStories.title: Expanded 4-column footer layout

acceptanceCriteria: Footer has 4 equal columns on desktop

Product: Manual, Models, The 7th Signal Free, Pricing
Guides: How to Build an Agent, Context Management
userStories.notes: Reference Amp footer layout with 4 distinct sections
